message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. I believe it would bring immense value to your operations, and I'm willing to part with it for $950,000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $850,000 is cutting it a bit close to my bottom line.  How about we meet in the middle at $900,000?  It's a fair price considering the value it will bring you.
I appreciate the effort to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $875,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
